name: server
description: ParentHub backend API using Express, Prisma ORM, and PostgreSQL (via Neon in cloud).

scripts.check:storage: node -e "try{require.resolve('tsx')}catch(e){process.exit(1)}" && npx tsx scripts/storage-sanity-check.ts || npx ts-node -P ../tsconfig.server.json scripts/storage-sanity-check.ts
scripts.check:udk: node -e "try{require.resolve('tsx')}catch(e){process.exit(1)}" && npx tsx scripts/storage-udk-check.ts || npx ts-node -P ../tsconfig.server.json scripts/storage-udk-check.ts
scripts.smoke:hash: node -e "(async()=>{const b=require('bcryptjs');const p='test123';const r=Number(process.env.BCRYPT_SALT_ROUNDS||10);const h=await b.hash(p,r);const ok=await b.compare(p,h);const bad=await b.compare('nope',h);console.log(JSON.stringify({rounds:r,ok,bad}));})();"
